languages.text: "Я сталкивался с разрешенными культами смерти, включавшими каннибализм в прославляющие Императора практики. Ересь гнездилась в таких сообществах удивительно часто".
"I have encountered sanctioned death cults that practised cannibalism as part of their way of praising the Emperor. A surprisingly large number of them harboured heresy within."
languages.original_text: "Я сталкивался с разрешенными культами смерти, включавшими каннибализм в прославляющие Императора практики. Ересь гнездилась в таких сообществах удивительно часто".

traits.locale_text: "I have encountered sanctioned death cults that practised cannibalism as part of their way of praising the Emperor. A surprisingly large number of them harboured heresy within."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I have encountered sanctioned death cults that practised cannibalism as part of their way of praising the Emperor. A surprisingly large number of them harboured heresy within."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我曾经遇到过获得帝国授权的死亡教派，他们把食人视为赞美帝皇的方式之一。不过，他们之中有相当一部分人，内心隐藏着异端思想。”
languages.original_text: "I have encountered sanctioned death cults that practised cannibalism as part of their way of praising the Emperor. A surprisingly large number of them harboured heresy within."

traits.locale_text: “我曾经遇到过获得帝国授权的死亡教派，他们把食人视为赞美帝皇的方式之一。不过，他们之中有相当一部分人，内心隐藏着异端思想。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「皇帝を祭る手段として人肉食を行う、公認の死のカルトに出くわした事があります。その中では、驚くほどの人数が異端を行っていましたよ」
languages.original_text: "I have encountered sanctioned death cults that practised cannibalism as part of their way of praising the Emperor. A surprisingly large number of them harboured heresy within."

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝を祭る手段として人肉食を行う、公認の死のカルトに出くわした事があります。その中では、驚くほどの人数が異端を行っていましたよ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Me he topado con cultos de la muerte que practicaban el canibalismo como forma de alabar al Emperador. Un gran número de ellos albergaba herejes».
languages.original_text: "I have encountered sanctioned death cults that practised cannibalism as part of their way of praising the Emperor. A surprisingly large number of them harboured heresy within."

traits.locale_text: «Me he topado con cultos de la muerte que practicaban el canibalismo como forma de alabar al Emperador. Un gran número de ellos albergaba herejes».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe sanktionierte Todeskulte erlebt, die als Teil ihrer Verehrung des Imperators Kannibalismus praktiziert haben. Eine überraschend große Anzahl davon beherbergte Ketzerei."
languages.original_text: "I have encountered sanctioned death cults that practised cannibalism as part of their way of praising the Emperor. A surprisingly large number of them harboured heresy within."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe sanktionierte Todeskulte erlebt, die als Teil ihrer Verehrung des Imperators Kannibalismus praktiziert haben. Eine überraschend große Anzahl davon beherbergte Ketzerei."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Il m'est arrivé de croiser la route de cultes de la mort autorisés qui s'adonnaient au cannibalisme pour vénérer l'Empereur. Beaucoup avaient des hérétiques en leur sein, bien plus qu'on pourrait le croire. »
languages.original_text: "I have encountered sanctioned death cults that practised cannibalism as part of their way of praising the Emperor. A surprisingly large number of them harboured heresy within."

traits.locale_text: « Il m'est arrivé de croiser la route de cultes de la mort autorisés qui s'adonnaient au cannibalisme pour vénérer l'Empereur. Beaucoup avaient des hérétiques en leur sein, bien plus qu'on pourrait le croire. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "İmparator'a şükretme yöntemi olarak yamyamlığı kullanan, onaylı bir ölüm tarikatlarıyla karşılaştım. Ne kadar çok mensubunun içinde kâfirlik yattığını öğrensen şaşarsın."
languages.original_text: "I have encountered sanctioned death cults that practised cannibalism as part of their way of praising the Emperor. A surprisingly large number of them harboured heresy within."

traits.locale_text: "Bir İmparator'a şükretme yöntemi olarak yamyamlığı kullanan, onaylı ölüm tarikatlarıyla karşılaştım. Ne kadar fazlasının içinde kâfirlik barındırdığını öğrensen şaşarsın."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
